verses.text_plain: And it came to pass after these things, that Naboth the Jezreelite had a vineyard, which was in Jezreel, hard by the palace of Ahab king of Samaria.
verses.verse_html: 1And it came to pass after these things, that Naboth the Jezreelite had a vineyard, which was in Jezreel, hard by the palace of Ahab king of Samaria.

tokens.text: And it came to pass after

verses.text_plain: And Ahab spake unto Naboth, saying, Give me thy vineyard, that I may have it for a garden of herbs, because it is near unto my house: and I will give thee for it a better vineyard than it; or, if it seem good to thee, I will give thee the worth of it in money.
verses.verse_html:
2And Ahab spake unto Naboth, saying, Give me thy vineyard, that I may have it for a garden of herbs, because it is near unto my house: and I will give thee for it a better vineyard than it; or, if it seem good to thee, I will give thee the worth of it in money. ▼
▼ seem…: Heb. be good in thine eyes

tokens.text: that I may have it for a garden

footnotes.body_text: ▼ seem…: Heb. be good in thine eyes
footnotes.body_html: ▼ seem…: Heb. be good in thine eyes

verses.text_plain: And Naboth said to Ahab, The Lord forbid it me, that I should give the inheritance of my fathers unto thee.
verses.verse_html: 3And Naboth said to Ahab, The Lord forbid it me, that I should give the inheritance of my fathers unto thee.

tokens.text: it me, that I should give

verses.text_plain: And Ahab came into his house heavy and displeased because of the word which Naboth the Jezreelite had spoken to him: for he had said, I will not give thee the inheritance of my fathers. And he laid him down upon his bed, and turned away his face, and would eat no bread.
verses.verse_html: 4And Ahab came into his house heavy and displeased because of the word which Naboth the Jezreelite had spoken to him: for he had said, I will not give thee the inheritance of my fathers. And he laid him down upon his bed, and turned away his face, and would eat no bread.

tokens.text: to him: for he had said

verses.text_plain: But Jezebel his wife came to him, and said unto him, Why is thy spirit so sad, that thou eatest no bread?
verses.verse_html: 5But Jezebel his wife came to him, and said unto him, Why is thy spirit so sad, that thou eatest no bread?

tokens.text: unto him, Why is thy spirit

verses.text_plain: And he said unto her, Because I spake unto Naboth the Jezreelite, and said unto him, Give me thy vineyard for money; or else, if it please thee, I will give thee another vineyard for it: and he answered, I will not give thee my vineyard.
verses.verse_html: 6And he said unto her, Because I spake unto Naboth the Jezreelite, and said unto him, Give me thy vineyard for money; or else, if it please thee, I will give thee another vineyard for it: and he answered, I will not give thee my vineyard.

verses.text_plain: And Jezebel his wife said unto him, Dost thou now govern the kingdom of Israel? arise, and eat bread, and let thine heart be merry: I will give thee the vineyard of Naboth the Jezreelite.
verses.verse_html: 7And Jezebel his wife said unto him, Dost thou now govern the kingdom of Israel? arise, and eat bread, and let thine heart be merry: I will give thee the vineyard of Naboth the Jezreelite.

tokens.text: unto him, Dost thou now govern

verses.text_plain: So she wrote letters in Ahab’s name, and sealed them with his seal, and sent the letters unto the elders and to the nobles that were in his city, dwelling with Naboth.
verses.verse_html: 8So she wrote letters in Ahab’s name, and sealed them with his seal, and sent the letters unto the elders and to the nobles that were in his city, dwelling with Naboth.

verses.text_plain: And she wrote in the letters, saying, Proclaim a fast, and set Naboth on high among the people:
verses.verse_html:
9And she wrote in the letters, saying, Proclaim a fast, and set Naboth on high among the people: ▼
▼ on high…: Heb. in the top of the people

footnotes.body_text: ▼ on high…: Heb. in the top of the people
footnotes.body_html: ▼ on high…: Heb. in the top of the people

verses.text_plain: And set two men, sons of Belial, before him, to bear witness against him, saying, Thou didst blaspheme God and the king. And then carry him out, and stone him, that he may die.
verses.verse_html: 10And set two men, sons of Belial, before him, to bear witness against him, saying, Thou didst blaspheme God and the king. And then carry him out, and stone him, that he may die.

verses.text_plain: And the men of his city, even the elders and the nobles who were the inhabitants in his city, did as Jezebel had sent unto them, and as it was written in the letters which she had sent unto them.
verses.verse_html: 11And the men of his city, even the elders and the nobles who were the inhabitants in his city, did as Jezebel had sent unto them, and as it was written in the letters which she had sent unto them.

verses.text_plain: They proclaimed a fast, and set Naboth on high among the people.
verses.verse_html: 12They proclaimed a fast, and set Naboth on high among the people.

verses.text_plain: And there came in two men, children of Belial, and sat before him: and the men of Belial witnessed against him, even against Naboth, in the presence of the people, saying, Naboth did blaspheme God and the king. Then they carried him forth out of the city, and stoned him with stones, that he died.
verses.verse_html: 13And there came in two men, children of Belial, and sat before him: and the men of Belial witnessed against him, even against Naboth, in the presence of the people, saying, Naboth did blaspheme God and the king. Then they carried him forth out of the city, and stoned him with stones, that he died.

tokens.text: in the presence of the people

verses.text_plain: Then they sent to Jezebel, saying, Naboth is stoned, and is dead.
verses.verse_html: 14Then they sent to Jezebel, saying, Naboth is stoned, and is dead.

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass, when Jezebel heard that Naboth was stoned, and was dead, that Jezebel said to Ahab, Arise, take possession of the vineyard of Naboth the Jezreelite, which he refused to give thee for money: for Naboth is not alive, but dead.
verses.verse_html: 15And it came to pass, when Jezebel heard that Naboth was stoned, and was dead, that Jezebel said to Ahab, Arise, take possession of the vineyard of Naboth the Jezreelite, which he refused to give thee for money: for Naboth is not alive, but dead.

tokens.text: And it came to pass, when Jezebel

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass, when Ahab heard that Naboth was dead, that Ahab rose up to go down to the vineyard of Naboth the Jezreelite, to take possession of it.
verses.verse_html: 16And it came to pass, when Ahab heard that Naboth was dead, that Ahab rose up to go down to the vineyard of Naboth the Jezreelite, to take possession of it.

tokens.text: And it came to pass, when Ahab

verses.text_plain: And the word of the Lord came to Elijah the Tishbite, saying,
verses.verse_html: 17And the word of the Lord came to Elijah the Tishbite, saying,

verses.text_plain: Arise, go down to meet Ahab king of Israel, which is in Samaria: behold, he is in the vineyard of Naboth, whither he is gone down to possess it.
verses.verse_html: 18Arise, go down to meet Ahab king of Israel, which is in Samaria: behold, he is in the vineyard of Naboth, whither he is gone down to possess it.

verses.text_plain: And thou shalt speak unto him, saying, Thus saith the Lord, Hast thou killed, and also taken possession? And thou shalt speak unto him, saying, Thus saith the Lord, In the place where dogs licked the blood of Naboth shall dogs lick thy blood, even thine.
verses.verse_html: 19And thou shalt speak unto him, saying, Thus saith the Lord, Hast thou killed, and also taken possession? And thou shalt speak unto him, saying, Thus saith the Lord, In the place where dogs licked the blood of Naboth shall dogs lick thy blood, even thine.

verses.text_plain: And Ahab said to Elijah, Hast thou found me, O mine enemy? And he answered, I have found thee: because thou hast sold thyself to work evil in the sight of the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 20And Ahab said to Elijah, Hast thou found me, O mine enemy? And he answered, I have found thee: because thou hast sold thyself to work evil in the sight of the Lord.

verses.text_plain: Behold, I will bring evil upon thee, and will take away thy posterity, and will cut off from Ahab him that pisseth against the wall, and him that is shut up and left in Israel,
verses.verse_html: 21Behold, I will bring evil upon thee, and will take away thy posterity, and will cut off from Ahab him that pisseth against the wall, and him that is shut up and left in Israel,

tokens.text: upon thee, and will take away
and him that is shut up

verses.text_plain: And will make thine house like the house of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, and like the house of Baasha the son of Ahijah, for the provocation wherewith thou hast provoked me to anger, and made Israel to sin.
verses.verse_html: 22And will make thine house like the house of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, and like the house of Baasha the son of Ahijah, for the provocation wherewith thou hast provoked me to anger, and made Israel to sin.

verses.text_plain: And of Jezebel also spake the Lord, saying, The dogs shall eat Jezebel by the wall of Jezreel.
verses.verse_html:
23And of Jezebel also spake the Lord, saying, The dogs shall eat Jezebel by the wall of Jezreel. ▼
▼ wall: or, ditch

verses.text_plain: Him that dieth of Ahab in the city the dogs shall eat; and him that dieth in the field shall the fowls of the air eat.
verses.verse_html: 24Him that dieth of Ahab in the city the dogs shall eat; and him that dieth in the field shall the fowls of the air eat.

verses.text_plain: But there was none like unto Ahab, which did sell himself to work wickedness in the sight of the Lord, whom Jezebel his wife stirred up.
verses.verse_html:
25But there was none like unto Ahab, which did sell himself to work wickedness in the sight of the Lord, whom Jezebel his wife stirred up. ▼
▼ stirred…: or, incited

tokens.text: But there was none like unto Ahab

verses.text_plain: And he did very abominably in following idols, according to all things as did the Amorites, whom the Lord cast out before the children of Israel.
verses.verse_html: 26And he did very abominably in following idols, according to all things as did the Amorites, whom the Lord cast out before the children of Israel.

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass, when Ahab heard those words, that he rent his clothes, and put sackcloth upon his flesh, and fasted, and lay in sackcloth, and went softly.
verses.verse_html: 27And it came to pass, when Ahab heard those words, that he rent his clothes, and put sackcloth upon his flesh, and fasted, and lay in sackcloth, and went softly.

tokens.text: And it came to pass, when Ahab

verses.text_plain: And the word of the Lord came to Elijah the Tishbite, saying,
verses.verse_html: 28And the word of the Lord came to Elijah the Tishbite, saying,

verses.text_plain: Seest thou how Ahab humbleth himself before me? because he humbleth himself before me, I will not bring the evil in his days: but in his son’s days will I bring the evil upon his house.
verses.verse_html: 29Seest thou how Ahab humbleth himself before me? because he humbleth himself before me, I will not bring the evil in his days: but in his son’s days will I bring the evil upon his house.
